Resources

  • Home
  • Resource

Here are resources that I developed with others. You may find them useful if you work on machine learning, or more generally, computer science.

Graph Embedding System
General and high-performance graph embedding system, with support of various applications and popular models.
Paper List for Graphs
Comprehensive list of recent deep learning literature for graphs.
Mahjong AI
Development toolkit for Chinese official Mahjong, with efficient search algorithms and interface for machine learning.
Dynamic Dictionary Matching
Efficient parallel implementation of hash-based dynamic dictionary matching.
